column1: This resort is amazing. I had an ocean front view room and all inclusive. The staff is amazingly friendly and there is so much to do here. They have a show ever...
I took the free lesson of scuba in the pool at the resort and never thought that I would actually go into the ocean and do the real thing. Manuel however was ve...
I got to visit this gem with the dressel divers team on my way to scuba dive and it is absolutely breathtaking.
